about_the_game:
Rite of Titans is a Free to Play hero-centric 3v3 action game - currently in the alpha stage. Master the moves and outplay your rivals in an epic, fast-paced hybrid of arcade sports and ability-based competition.



Hone your own skills through solo matchmaking or build a team with your Steam friends to strategize and outflank your opponents.



Score 10 points or get the highest score within 5 minutes to win. Draws trigger a deathmatch where the first team to score claims victory.



Are you a Defender, Midfielder, or Striker? Pick a specialty and make the best of your hero's unique abilities.



Enter unique arenas, conquer diverse challenges. Each offers distinct play styles and opportunities. Adapt, strategize, triumph!



No Pay-to-Win here: only your skill can make a difference. Want to support us? We'll have a treasure trove of skins and other cosmetics for you to choose from.



Shape the game by joining early and sharing your feedback with the team. Wishlist to join Early Access, or apply to playtest our pre-alpha build now.

Features we have currently planned (please keep in mind that this is not necessarily the order in which they will be added to the game, as your feedback will have a large impact on our priorities):

  • brand new arena maps
  • new heroes with new playstyles
  • full equipment and an inventory system
  • player accounts and a progression system
  • skins and consumables
  • custom rooms for custom gameplay

The team also are looking to release on Consoles, but this will only be considered after we leave Early Access. Our current focus is to make a kickass PC game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 3.2+ GHz 6 core CPUs
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060, AMD RX 5600 XT, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
